title: Sᴇʟғ Mᴏᴅᴇ
desc: Change Bot Working Type To Private usage...!

title: Pᴜʙʟɪᴄ Mᴏᴅᴇ
desc: Change Bot Working Type To Public usage...!

title: Onʟʏ Aᴅᴍɪɴ Mᴏᴅᴇ
desc: Change Bot Working Type To Only Admins usage...!

title: Gʀᴏᴜᴘ Sᴀғᴇᴛʏ Mᴏᴅᴇ Oɴ
desc: Turn onn group safety features...!

title: Gʀᴏᴜᴘ Sᴀғᴇᴛʏ Oғғ
desc: Turn off group safety features...!

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Rᴇᴀᴅ Sᴛᴀᴛᴜs Oɴ
desc: Turn onn to automatically see everyone's status...!

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Rᴇᴀᴅ Sᴛᴀᴛᴜs Oғғ
desc: Turn off to don't see everyone's status automatically...!

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Rᴇᴄᴏʀᴅ Oɴ
desc: Turn onn to show recoding while replying

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Rᴇᴄᴏʀᴅ Oғғ
desc: Turn off to don't show recoding while replying...!

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Tʏᴘɪɴɢ Oɴ
desc: Turn on to show typing while replying...!

title: Aᴜᴛᴏ Tʏᴘɪɴɢ Oғғ
desc: Turn off to don't show typing while replying...!

title: Aʟᴡᴀʏs Oɴʟɪɴᴇ Oɴ
desc: Turn on to always show online seen...!

title: Aʟᴡᴀʏs Oɴʟɪɴᴇ Oғғ
desc: Turn off to don't show online seen...!

title: Eɴɢʟɪsʜ Lᴀɴɢᴜᴀɢᴇ
desc: Tap here to change bot's language to English...!

title: Fʀᴇɴᴄʜ Lᴀɴɢᴜᴀɢᴇ
desc: Tap here to change bot's language to French...!

title: Aʀᴀʙɪᴄ Lᴀɴɢᴜᴀɢᴇ
desc: Tap here to change bot's language to Arabic...!

title: Wᴇʟᴄᴏᴍᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oɴ
desc: Tap here to turn onn welcome message for groups...!

title: Wᴇʟᴄᴏᴍᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oғғ
desc: Tap here to turn off welcome message for groups...!

title: Gᴏᴏᴅʙʏᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ ᴏɴ
desc: Tap here to turn onn goodbye message for groups...!

title: Gᴏᴏᴅʙʏᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oғғ
desc: Tap here to turn off goodbye message for groups...!

title: Promote Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oɴ
desc: Tap here to turn onn promote message for groups...!

title: Pʀᴏᴍᴏᴛᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oғғ
desc: Tap here to turn off promote message for groups...!

title: Dᴇᴍᴏᴛᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oɴ
desc: Tap here to turn onn demote message for groups...!

title: Dᴇᴍᴏᴛᴇ Nᴏᴛɪғʏ Oғғ
desc: Tap here to turn off demote message for groups...!

title: Sɪɴɢʟᴇ Pʀᴇғɪx
desc: Tap here to use bot by only one prefix...!

title: Mᴜʟᴛɪ Pʀᴇғɪx
desc: Tap here to use bot by multi prefixes...!

title: Aʟʟ Pʀᴇғɪx
desc: Tap here to us bot by multi prefixes + no prefix...!
